verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Hear<WH8085> my prayer<WH8605>, O Jehovah<WH3068>; Give ear<WH238> to my supplications<WH8469>: In thy faithfulness<WH530> answer<WH6030> me<WH6666>, and in thy righteousness.
And enter<WH935> not into judgment<WH4941> with thy servant<WH5650>; For in thy sight<WH6440> no man living<WH2416> is righteous<WH6663>.

For the enemy<WH341> hath persecuted<WH7291> my soul<WH5315>; He hath smitten<WH1792> my life<WH2416> down<WH1792> to the ground<WH776>: He hath made me to dwell<WH3427> in dark<WH4285> places<WH5769>, as those that have been long dead<WH4191>.
Therefore is my spirit<WH7307> overwhelmed<WH5848> within me<WH3820>; My heart within<WH8432> me is desolate<WH8074>.
I remember<WH2142> the days<WH3117> of old<WH6924>; I meditate<WH1897> on all thy doings<WH6467>; I muse<WH7878> on the work<WH4639> of thy hands<WH3027>.
I spread forth<WH6566> my hands<WH3027> unto thee<WH5315>: My soul thirsteth after thee<WH5889>, as a weary land<WH776>. <WH5542>[[Selah

Make haste<WH4118> to answer<WH6030> me<WH3068>, O Jehovah; My spirit<WH7307> faileth<WH3615>: Hide<WH5641> not thy face<WH6440> from me<WH4911>, Lest I become like them that go down<WH3381> into the pit<WH953>.

Cause me to hear<WH8085> thy lovingkindness<WH2617> in the morning<WH1242>; For in thee do I trust<WH982>: Cause me to know<WH3045> the way<WH1870> wherein<WH2098> I should walk<WH3212>; For I lift up<WH5375> my soul unto thee<WH5315>.
Deliver <WH5337> me<WH3068>, O Jehovah, from mine enemies<WH341>: I flee unto thee to hide me<WH3680>.
Teach <WH3925> me to do<WH6213> thy will<WH7522>; For thou art my God<WH430>: Thy Spirit<WH7307> is good<WH2896>; Lead<WH5148> me in the land<WH776> of uprightness<WH4334>.
Quicken <WH2421> me<WH3068>, O Jehovah, for thy name<WH8034>'s sake<WH6666>: In thy righteousness bring<WH3318> my soul<WH5315> out of trouble<WH6869>.
And in thy lovingkindness<WH2617> cut off<WH6789> mine enemies<WH341>, And destroy<WH6> all them that afflict<WH6887> my soul<WH5315>; For I am thy servant<WH5650>.
